channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Couple of deep pothole opening up outside lakeside school, 31st December
item.description:
Potholes… not much more to say, too dark and dangerous to take a photo I’m afraid.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 279 Hatherley Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Hedge overflowing on to pavement, 31st December
item.description:
The hedge along the first section of Jersey Avenue is overflowing blocking the pavement. It requires cutting back
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 122 Hewlett Road, Cheltenham

item.title: Pothole forming, 31st December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 Brookfield Road, Churchdown
